item.title: ‘Superman’ Actor Skyler Gisondo in Talks to Play Ben Stiller’s Son in ‘Meet the Parents 4’
item.description: Robert De Niro and Ariana Grande also star in writer-director John Hamburg’s new feature in the Universal franchise.
